clinical_study.brief_title: Curative Study of Chinese Traditional Medicine to Treat Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer With Chinese Medicine Comprehensive Treatment Plan

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

clinical_study.source: Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to observe the efficacy of chemotherapy combined with Chinese patent drugs for patients with advanced non-small-cell lung cancer, also to evaluate the adverse reaction and the reliability.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause，up to 2 months
primary_outcome.description: The progression disease is assessed based on CT every 2 months from date of randomization and the endpoints is the date of first documented progression or date of death due to lung cancer.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related quality of life as assessed by FACT－L4.0

arm_group.description: Eligible subjects will be treated with platinum-doublet 2 cycles chemotherapy:pemetrexed,docetaxel,gemcitabine,paclitaxel or vinorelbine combined with carboplatin、cis-platinum or nedaplatin. Each cycle was 21-days. Dosage:pemetrexed i.v.500mg/m2 d1 ; docetaxel i.v.75mg/m2 d1 ; gemcitabine i.v.1250 mg/m2 d1,d8 ; paclitaxel i.v.175mg/m2 d1 ; vinorelbine i.v.25mg/m2 d1,d8; carboplatin i.v.area under curve (AUC) 5 d1 ；cis-platinum i.v.75mg/m2 d1（or divided into 3days）；nedaplatin i.v.80mg/m2 d1.
TCM：JinFuKang plus XingZaoRuanJian, chemotherapy will be the same. JinFuKang po.tid.30ml d6-d21 XingZaoRuanJian po.tid.30ml d6-d21

intervention.intervention_name: pemetrexed,docetaxel,gemcitabine,paclitaxel or vinorelbine combined with carboplatin、cis-platinum or nedaplatin
